description:
Enjoy deeper satisfaction both at work and at home. This course will help you identify ways to become more productive at work so that you can get more done in less time. It will challenge how you currently think about work and the various roles you play in life.

The combination of videos and pdf worksheets provide the opportunity to record your thoughts and determine the specific shifts you'll take as you walk through the four steps in the course instructions.

If you reach for caffeine to get going in the morning, more of it or sweets in the afternoon, find yourself distracted by social media and constant emails or phone calls that keep you from getting anything done this course will help you reduce the chaos and get you disconnected and onto life.
title: Better Work - Life Balance in 4 Steps
